import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; const Menu = ({ section }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; useEffect(() => { if (!userInfo) { redirectTo(); } }, [dispatch, userInfo]); const redirectTo = () => { return ( ); }; return (
GUACARI
{userInfo ? userInfo.name : ""}
{section === 'restaurante' ? (
    {/* Restaurante Menu Items */}
  • RESTOBAR

  • Órdenes Activas

  • Delivery

  • Historial

  • GESTIÓN

  • Categorías

  • Productos

  • Ingredientes

  • Clientes

  • Mesas

) : (
    {/* Hotel Menu Items */}
  • HOTEL

  • Reservas

  • Habitaciones

  • Servicios

  • Clientes

  • Facturación

)}
); }; export default Menu;
